title: Update HTML document title to Aswin-Resume

requirements.summary: Change the HTML document <title> in frontend/index.html so the browser tab title displays exactly "Aswin-Resume".
acceptanceCriteria: When the app is opened in a browser, the tab title displays exactly "Aswin-Resume".
No other UI text (e.g., navigation/site header title) is changed as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update the document <title> value from the current text to exactly "Aswin-Resume" without changing any other markup or on-page branding text.
